name: Quarantine Run (Maynemotions Studios)
description:
This is an exciting, fun and creatively themed endless runner game. The objective of the game is to run as long as you. while avoiding the obstacle the will appear in your way to avoid being infected and gaining a highscore to boast about with your friends.

CONTROLS

Move Left:      Left arrow or swipe left with mouse

Move Right:    Right Arrow or swipe right with mouse

Jump:             Space bar or swipe up with mouse
Roll:                Down Arrow or swipe down with mouse

Free Run Left and right :   A and D 

Download Instructions:
Download Zip, UnZip File, Launch Executable and Enjoy Game.
